```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(tidyquant)
tq_get_options()
aapl_stock_prices <- tq_get("AAPL")
mult_stocks <- tq_get(c("FB", "AMZN"),
                      get  = "stock.prices",
                      from = "2016-01-01",
                      to   = "2017-01-01")
```
